total_revenue.context: Q3 2025 consolidated revenue of $102.3B driven by double-digit growth across Search, YouTube, subscriptions, platforms, and devices, and Cloud.

google_services.context: Google Services revenue (Search & other, YouTube ads, devices, subscriptions).

google_cloud.context: Google Cloud revenue growth led by enterprise AI demand; backlog reached $155B (+46% q/q).

other_bets.context: Other Bets revenue, with continuing investment in Waymo, Wing, X, and DeepMind; operating loss $1.4B.

operating_income.context: Operating income; ex-EC fine, operating margin was 33.9%.

net_income.context: Net income after $12.8B other income (mainly securities gains) and $3.5B EC fine.

free_cash_flow.context: Q3 free cash flow and TTM $73.6B, aided by cash tax and CapEx timing.

capital_expenditures.context: Q3 CapEx focused on servers (60%), data centers & networking (40%); FY25 outlook now $91-93B.

google_search.context: Search & other revenue, with retail and financial services leading growth.

youtube_advertising.context: Driven by direct response, brand, and auto creation tools.

youtube_subscriptions.context: YouTube and Google One subscriptions growing 21% y/y, enhancing YouTubeâ€™s twin-engine monetization.

youtube_shorts.context: Shorts viewership remains strong with higher revenue per view in the U.S.

backlog.context: $155B backlog, +46% sequential, +82% y/y; strong demand for enterprise AI.

billion_dollar_deals.context: Signed more $1B+ deals in first 9 months of 2025 than the prior two years combined.

ai_innovation.description: Gemini 3 preview, Project Astra, AI Overviews, AI Mode, Veo 3, and expanded Gemini integration across Chrome, Assistant, and Android XR.
highlights: Gemini app 650M MAUs, 3x q/q query growth; AI Mode rolled out in 40+ languages with 75M DAUs
Gemini Enterprise agents deployed across 700 companies with >2M subscribers
AI Hypercomputer, Axion ARM CPUs, new TPU/pod instances, and partnership with Nvidia (A4X MAX).
13 product lines at $1B+ ARR, 150 customers processed ~1T tokens in 12 months
Vertex AI, Duet AI, Chronicle, and partnerships with Accenture/Deloitte training 150K developers
AI Hypercomputer and Axion CPU offering to leading labs (Anthropic, Character.ai, Mistral).
goals: Deliver margin expansion with differentiated AI services
Drive $50B+ cloud run-rate while improving capital efficiency

initiatives: Waymo expansions (Atlanta, Dallas, Seattle, Nashville, London, Tokyo) and 100M+ autonomous miles
Wing + Walmart deliveries expanding, X spinning out projects, DeepMind integration
Ongoing investment and cost discipline across moonshots
goals: Sharpen focus on autonomous and AI security

capex.context: Raised FY25 CapEx expectation driven by AI compute, data center, and networking needs.

revenue_growth.context: Powered by Search, YouTube, Cloud, and continued subscription strength despite FX/seasonality headwinds.

drivers: Annual investments in safety, hardware launches, and infrastructure

executive_notes.focus: Sustaining AI leadership, managing EC fine impact, and funding continued cloud/A I expansion
